runs.comm: full and a hint of inswing in the channel, ignored. Bhuvneshwar has cranked up pace; nudging to 140ks
Mustafa strides forward, this one nibbles back in on a back of a length and hits the kneeroll. The tracker shows that it would have bounced over the stumps
another incoming ball, turned to midwicket
this is too full and outside off, leans forward and drives it crisply.... finds the man at cover
Bhuvneshwar drags his length back, this ducks back in to ping off the pad towards the leg side
back of a length and swerves back in at 137ks, raps the thigh again. Height was an issue as Mustafa was left prodding and missing. Maiden first up
pitched up and angled in, front-foot push to mid-off
short and ducks back in, fended to cover
full toss wide outside off, this should have been dispatched. Instead, Patil pushes it weakly to point
full at 135ks, angled in, and leaves the right hander a touch outside off, beating the outside edge
UAE open the account off their 11th ball. Short and width outside off, slashed to the right of third man. Bhuvi slides and stops the ball in the deep
blockhole ball from Bumrah, nailed at the base of middle, Mustafa jams his bat down on it
full inswinger, this time to the right-hander, tapped to mid-off
back of a length and largely holds its line outside off, this time the extra bounce skirts past the outside edge
Bhuvi lands this on a fourth-stump line and gets it to swing away, Patil chases it loosely and misses

A string of nine dots has reaped reward for Bhuvi. Good length and angled in, Patil targets the leg side with a flick. This stopped slightly on him. He lobs it in the air off a leading edge. Bhuvi snaps up the return catch, chest-high clasp
full and wobbles back in, the bat twists in Shahzad's hand, poked to mid-on off the inside half
another one that cuts back in appreciably. It thuds into the pad even before the batsman could think about his shot. Back-to-back maidens from Bhuvneshwar, including a wicket
full toss dips late, a la Malinga. Squirted onto the pad off the inside edge
beauty from Bumrah. Back of a length, extra bounce, angled in and zips away past the groping bat

Shahzad has nicked off for a duck! Short and outside off at 143ks, Shahzad has a leaden-footed jab away from the body. He can only edge it to the cordon. Raina grabs it in front of his face at second slip
Bumrah greets Shaiman with a 139ks lifter on the leg stump. Shaiman is up for the challenge, though he was late on the hook. Flapped over the keeper's head with a top edge
Bumrah's radar goes haywire now. He darts this one down the leg side
short and decks back in, pushed tamely to the off side
intent from Shaiman. He races down the track to meet a length back. Crunched straight to mid-off, though
full and outside off, down the track. Mustafa has a big, wild whoosh.... but does not connect

could have been another wicket for Bhuvneshwar. If you look at the scorecard, then first runs off Bhuvneshwar. Awayswinger outside off from a fuller length, the batsman chases it with his feet in cement. Bhuvneshwar locks the target, finds the outside edge... It flies to the right of second slip at an awkward chest height. Raina snatches at it and watches the ball burst through his grasp to the third man boundary.. It would have been an easier take for Rohit
bouncer down leg, ducked under. Wided
full and outside off at 138.9ks, left alone
banged in, Bhuvi hits the deck and gets it to move away, the batsman hops, he is squared up as he pokes a single to third man
Anwar steps out and gets a short ball. He top-edges a pull that lands right between mid-on and mid-off
pitched up and outside off, Mustafa is crease-bound as he aims a drive, edges to Raina at second slip who makes a diving save
back of a length and comes in, worked to the leg side
short ball on middle, steps away for a hook/swipe. Top-edges it over the keeper's head
down the track, yorks himself, squeezes it towards point
full and ducks in, dragged behind square off the inside half
length and comes in, Shaiman is rooted to the crease as he flays and gets an inside edge to the leg side
short, lifting ball. Curves back in, fended onto the pitch
short on middle, he leaves the batsman hopping as well. Fended to cover
full and seams back in from outside off, scoots past the inside edge. Kept low too
bumper down leg at 135ks, Shaiman sways out of the way. Wide
length, cuts back in, beats the inside edge. Slicing Shaiman into half
full and moves away outside off, eased to deep cover for two
width outside off, slashed past point
length and outside off from round the wicket, left alone
pushed through outside off with extra bounce, punched to cover on the back foot
flighted offbreak, slower through the air, knocked towards square leg
straighter in line, prodded to the cover
slider outside off, stabbed to cover
sharp spin for Harbhajan, jags in and takes the pad
fired at 92ks, Shaiman steps across off, nearly swings himself off his feet and topples over. Heave and a miss
Rohan dances out, this is banged short and outside off. He throws his hands at the ball and misses it
lifting ball, climbs over the stumps, Mustafa swats... He still can't put bat on ball
another one homing in towards the chest, Mustafa leaps off his feet and diffuses it to the off side
hit straight into the lap of Kohli at cover. No celebrations at all. Short and wide outside off at 145.4ks, backed away and slapped to Kohli. Like target practice
back of a length on middle and nips away. Beaten
much fuller, moves away outside off, past the outside edge. Another maiden, another wicket-maiden
floated on middle, deflected behind square on the leg side off the thigh pad
hurrying ball, slides in, chopped behind point
flatter and outside off, forced to deep cover. Stands tall and cracks it away
length, non-turning ball, slogged over midwicket
flighted on off and breaks away past the outside edge
drifts in, takes the pad and dribbles away fine on the leg side
Pandya hits a short length outside off and gets it to trampoline outside off. Slash and a miss
much fuller and nips in, camps back and pushes it back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, slashes a cut to third man
full and shapes away outside off, leaving Usman prodding and missing
fractionally short on middle and leg, whipped away in the gap between midwicket and long-on
141ks attempted yorker, ends up being too full and outside off, sliced away through backward point
looped up and drifts in, pushed back to the bowler
slides on middle, backs away, cuts from the stumps towards long-off
looped up and turns, jumps in the channel to stupefy the batsman

loopier and outside off again, not much bounce here. But Harbhajan drags the left-hander forward for a sweep. He can't put bat on ball and loses his balance, Dhoni whips the bails off quickly. Usman pushes his back foot back and reaches safety
shorter and outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
darted outside off, square-cut away
pushed through short on off, swatted down the ground, towards long-on
dragged down leg, stage fright, helped away past fine leg who is in the circle
short and outside off again, cracked to sweeper
slides on middle, backed away and cut firmly behind point. Bhuvneshwar slides to his right in the deep and stops it

Negi gets his first international scalp. He tosses it up, Usman uses his feet, meets a full ball. He attempts a big swipe over midwicket, but can only sky it to Harbhajan, running in from long-off. That should settle Negi's nerves
full and drifts in, driven to long-off. Negi gets a pat on the back from Bumrah
slides on off, cut from there to sweeper cover
soft, soft dismissal. Tossed up, drifts in and dips. Amjad bags a first-ball duck. He feebly chips it to the left of midwicket, simple catch. The Harbhajan-Negi combo in the thick of action, again
Harbhajan shakes his head and sticks in tongue out, not quite like the Undertaker, who will return for Wrestlemania. Leg-side wide

looped up and spins outside off with extra bounce, lures the batsman into an expansive drive. He misses and nearly falls over. But drags his back foot in time even as Dhoni is quick to whip the bails off
Harbhajan hangs it in the air, gets it to dip. Jammed out
flicked from outside off to midwicket off the inside half
heading down the leg side, helped fine with the angle
flighted and turns outside off with extra bounce, top-edged cut to point
pushed quicker through the air and spins over the off stump, beating the batsman
short and fired on off, hit back to Negi
Negi finds the leading edge as the batsman attempts a leg-side clip. The ball rolls to the off side
fired on off, cracked to long-on
full and fast, he goes low for a slog sweep but topples over. The result is a thick inside edge onto pad
pretty full and dips on the leg stump, catches the pad
darted short and outside off, cut hard to cover
fired on off again, backs away and slaps it away to the left of cover, beats long-off as well
jabbing punch to long-off now as this was short as well

cracker of a catch from Pandya! Full on middle, Kaleem goes low and slogs it in the air. Pandya sprints in from long-on, flings himself forward even as the ball was dipping on him. He takes a superb low catch, inches from the turf. Subdued celebrations overall. A wicket each for six bowlers used by Dhoni
slid through on middle, mistimed pull finds midwicket
pitched up and outside off, tapped past cover
shortish and outside off, hit hard to long-off

flighted and just a shade outside off, the batsman swings and misses. Dhoni takes the bails off but the back foot was grounded. Why was Raina going up for an appeal from slip. MS Dhoni gives Raina a late wink
full and turns outside off, beats the batsman again
steps out and drives it to deep cover for a couple

UAE continue to crumble. Make that 66 for 7. Speared at 92.9ks, pushed to the left of the bowler, more towards short cover. Tariq wants a non-existent single. Shaiman sends him back. He is run out by two yards.
leg-side wide
tossed up and full, jammed out
low full toss on off, driven to long-off
Yuvraj lobs a full toss outside off, swings and misses. Was there a faint tickle there?
sliced over mid-off

short and hurries on leg, punched down down the ground. The throw from, Pandya I guess, is flat and quick. Dhoni collects it and takes the bails off. Lazy effort, but just safe. Naveed plonked his bat down instead of sliding it in
nudged off the pads towards the square-leg region
angled in full on off, swung away. Just clears Dhawan at mid-off
full on middle, carved to deep cover
lovely slower ball outside off, he shuffles across but is trickled by the change of pace. It would have shaved the off stump on another day
another slower, full ball. 119ks on middle. Shaiman spots it and drills it over Bumrah's head
nails a yorker outside off, 140ks, can't be squeezed out
yorker, bends back in with the angle. Anwar loads up for a big swing, but can only inside-edge it on his pad/boot
sharp 137ks rising ball, Naveed looks to hook. No dice
Negi pockets a skier. Bhuvneshwar takes his second. Another 137ks short ball, Naveed puts bat on ball. Hoicks it and sends a top edge over square leg. Negi hangs on to it even as the ball bobbled out
the batsman shuffles across off, yorker just outside the leg. Shaiman was looking out for a wide. Not there
short and tucks Shaiman up for room, swatted to cow corner
banged in outside off, big swing and a miss from Raza. He takes off for a single. Dhoni collects the ball quickly and knocks the leg stump out. Shaiman gone for 43
Bhuvneshwar finishes off the innings with a bouncer, 139.2ks Qadeer attempts to hook. But is late and can't make contact
